name: @optimal/fn
description: Force V8 to try to optimize a function and check optimization status.
author: Eli Doran <eli+npm@elidoran.com>

scripts.coverage: istanbul cover _mocha -- --compilers coffee:coffee-script/register --require coffee-coverage/register-istanbul -R spec  test/lib/coffee test/lib/js
scripts.publish-coverage: npm run coverage && cat coverage/lcov.info | coveralls
scripts.coverage-lcov: istanbul cover _mocha --report lcovonly -- --compilers coffee:coffee-script/register --require coffee-coverage/register-istanbul -R spec  test/lib/coffee test/lib/js
scripts.travis: npm run clean && npm run coverage-lcov
